episode_event_academy_autumn02/8301_1001:
Yippee! I’m so happy I get to go to
school now!
You sure look like you’re having fun, Poppy!
Yep! One of my wishes came true!

At school, there are big people and little
people and...all kinds in between!

And there’s lots of Pokémon, and it’s fun
every day!

Let’s take classes together and go to the
cafeteria sometime, OK?
Doing stuff at school with friends...

That’s right! I hope we can study a lot
together and become good classmates!

Y’know, at Bloo-berry Academy, I got to be
a “special coach”!
So I wanna try teachin’ stuff here too!

That’s amazing, Poppy! I’m sure you’ll be a
great teacher.
Hee hee! Yeah, I got this!
episode_event_academy_autumn02/8302_1001: For some reason, I trip and fall a lot...

And when I do, Ms. Miriam helps patch
me up.

But it happens so often, she tells me I need
to “be serious” and be more careful.

Hahaha! I can understand why she’d be
worried!

After all, even a little fall can lead to a
big injury.

If I exercised and got in shape, maybe I’d
stop falling so much.

You can strengthen your legs and back to
catch yourself before you fall!
I could coach you if you’d like!
Oh wow, really? That’d be great!
Let’s start with some warm-up exercises!

Follow my lead, Mr. Jacq! One! Two!
One! Two!

That’s perfect, Mr. Jacq! Just like that—keep
that fire burning!
episode_event_academy_autumn02/8303_1001: I heard you used to get sick often...

Yes! As you can see, I’m as healthy as
can be!
From what I can see, you look great!

I was able to recover in both spirit
and mind.

When it comes to spirit...there was someone
I wanted to catch up to, no matter what.

I really wanted to beat them, and that
motivated me to give my all.

When I was feeling down because I couldn’t
pass the health teacher certification exam...

I was inspired by someone who pushed
themselves very hard. Seeing that gave
me what I needed to try again.

And now, maybe thanks to them,
I’m Ms. Miriam, the teacher!

Of course, MOST of the credit for my success
goes to my own hard work, though! Hehe.
Seems we have a lot in common, don’t we.

Yeah! We both met people who changed our
lives in a good way.
That’s something to be grateful for.

We’re lucky to have these relationships,
and we’d best treasure them!
episode_event_academy_autumn02/8304_1001: Finally found ya! So this is where you are...
What’s going on? What do you need me for?
There’s something I wanted to tell you!

The Aether Foundation takes care of lost
Pokémon even here on Pasio, right?
I wanted to say thanks for that!

You spent all that time looking for me just to
say that?

You really should tell that to my mom, who’s
the president. Or the employees.
Great idea! I’ll do that later!

Y’know, you really are just like
everyone says.
Yeah, everyone says the same thing.

They say you LOOK scary but you care a lot
about your friends and Pokémon—and
you’re really a nice guy!

So I thought I’d just come right up and try
talkin’ to ya.
Hah... You’re a straightforward kind of guy.

Hey, if you don’t mind, can I see your
Pokémon? We can have a battle!

Yeah, all right. Let’s see just what kind of
Trainer you are.
